import { Sandpack } from "@codesandbox/sandpack-react";

# 5.1. JS editor

:::info
**This page do not use Labosaurus.**  
It uses [Sandpack](https://github.com/codesandbox/sandpack) and [Docusaurus Live Editor](https://docusaurus.io/docs/markdown-features/code-blocks#interactive-code-editor).
:::


## Sandpack - ReactJS basic

<Sandpack template="react" />

## Sandpack - ReactJS full

Dark theme, dependencies, multiple files, line numbers.

<Sandpack
  theme="dark"
  options={{
    showLineNumbers: true,
    showInlineErrors: true,
  }}
  customSetup={{
    entry: "/App.js",
    dependencies: { 
      "react": "latest",
      "react-dom": "latest",
      "react-markdown": "latest" 
    },
  }}
  files={{
    "/App.jsx": `import ReactDOM from 'react-dom';
import ReactMarkdown from 'react-markdown';

export default function App() {
  return <ReactMarkdown># Hello, *world*!</ReactMarkdown>;
}

const root = ReactDOM.createRoot(
document.getElementById('root')
);
root.render(<App/>);`,
    "/index.html": `<html>

<body>
  <div id="root"></div>
</body>

</html>`,
}}
/>

## Sandpack - VueJS basic

<Sandpack template="vue" />

## Sandpack - Labosaurus components
<Sandpack
  theme="dark"
  options={{
    showLineNumbers: true,
    showInlineErrors: true,
  }}
  customSetup={{
    entry: "/index.jsx",
    dependencies: { 
      "react": "latest",
      "react-dom": "latest",
      "@jaouan/labosaurus": "latest",
      "tslib": "latest",
      "clsx": "latest",
      "firebase": "latest",
    },
  }}
  files={{
    "/App.jsx": `import { Hint } from '@jaouan/labosaurus';

export default function App() {
  return (
    <>
      Lorem ipsum
      <Hint>oui</Hint>
    </>
  );
}`,
    "/index.jsx": {
      code:`import ReactDOM from 'react-dom';
import App from './App';

ReactDOM.createRoot(
  document.getElementById('root')
).render(<App/>);`, hidden: true},
    "/index.html": {
      code:`<html>

<body>
  <div id="root" class="markdown"></div>
  <link href="https://lab.jaouan.dev/sandpack-docusaurus.css" rel="stylesheet">
</body>

</html>`, 
      hidden:true
    },
}}
/>


<Sandpack
  theme="dark"
  options={{
    showLineNumbers: true,
    showInlineErrors: true,
  }}
  customSetup={{
    entry: "/index.jsx",
    dependencies: { 
      "react": "latest",
      "react-dom": "latest",
      "@jaouan/labosaurus": "latest",
      "tslib": "latest",
      "clsx": "latest",
      "firebase": "latest",
    },
  }}
  files={{
    "/App.jsx": `import { SimpleQuestion } from '@jaouan/labosaurus';

export default function App() {
  return (
    <SimpleQuestion
      label="ðŸ«µ What's the weather like today?"
      answer="Sunny"
      wrongAnswers={["Cloudy", "Rainy"]}
    />
  );
}`,
    "/index.jsx":{
      code: `import ReactDOM from 'react-dom';
import App from './App';

ReactDOM.createRoot(
  document.getElementById('root')
).render(<App/>);`,
      hidden:true
    },
    "/index.html": {
      code:`<html>
<body>
  <div id="root" class="markdown"></div>
  <link href="https://lab.jaouan.dev/sandpack-docusaurus.css" rel="stylesheet">
</body>

</html>`,
    hidden: true
  },
}}
/>

## Docusaurus (native) - ReactJS

```jsx live
function Clock(props) {
  const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date());

  useEffect(() => {
    const timerID = setInterval(() => tick(), 1000);
    return () => clearInterval(timerID);
  });

  function tick() {
    setDate(new Date());
  }

  return (
    <div>
      <h2>It is {date.toLocaleTimeString()}.</h2>
    </div>
  );
}
```
